item.title: Eye operation theatre opened in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: A state-of-the-art eye operation theatre was inaugurated at the Government General Hospital in Gadwal on Sunday with local MLA Bandla Krishnamohan Reddy and collector B.M. Santosh in attendance.
Krishnamohan Reddy highlighted the government's efforts to deliver quality healthcare to rural areas and said that advanced eye treatments will be accessible closer to home following the inauguration of the facility.
Collector Santosh said that the addition of specialised facilities in dis...]]>
